trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around November 16th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailslooked out window saw a silver bright flashing object moving over roof, toware NE, it went behind tree flashing to a count of seven times, it vanished, another small object came in with rec bottom, it vanished, and another silver flashing object came in. the time started at 6:33, and went on until 7:18. what a show.
Summary: saw an object silver flashing, another small one with red light on bottom, and another silver one.
